statements: ALTER TABLE quantum_computing_research ADD COLUMN research_description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE quantum_computing_research DROP COLUMN publish_date;
ALTER TABLE quantum_computing_results ADD COLUMN result_score INT;
ALTER TABLE qubits ADD COLUMN description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE entanglement DROP COLUMN qubit_2;
ALTER TABLE quantum_computers ADD COLUMN price DECIMAL(10,2);
ALTER TABLE qubits ADD COLUMN created_at TIMESTAMP
ALTER TABLE quantum_gates ADD COLUMN last_updated TIMESTAMP
ALTER TABLE quantum_algorithms ADD COLUMN author VARCHAR
ALTER TABLE qubits ADD COLUMN new_column VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE quantum_gates ADD COLUMN gate_parameters TEXT;
ALTER TABLE quantum_algorithms DROP COLUMN algorithm_description;
